HOME-PAGE.FIND_PET_DESC: Discover your new best friend through our innovative pet matching system. Every search brings you closer to unconditional love.
HOME-PAGE.PREFERENCES_MATCHING_DESC: Our system uses smart techniques and artificial intelligence to analyze your preferences and find the right pet for you.
HOME-PAGE.INSTANT_COMMUNICATION_DESC: Connect directly with shelters and pet owners through our secure messaging system.
HOME-PAGE.FEATURE_SEARCH_DESC: Find the perfect companion among our carefully curated collection of beloved pets.
HOME-PAGE.FEATURE_MATCH_DESC: Our smart matching system helps you find and connect with the right shelter to adopt the pet that fits your lifestyle.
HOME-PAGE.FEATURE_ADOPT_DESC: Start the journey of love and companionship with your new four-legged friend.
HOME-PAGE.FOOTER_SLOGAN: We find forever homes for our four-legged friends.

ADOPT.TITLE: Time for Adoption!
ADOPT.SUBTITLE: A new family member is waiting for you
ADOPT.STATUS_CHANGE_WARNING: Changing the status will notify the applicant via email.
ADOPT.NO_EDIT_PERMISSION_MESSAGE: You can only edit adoption applications for animals from your own shelter.
ADOPT.STATUS_MANAGEMENT_INFO_MESSAGE: Only the shelter that received this application can change its status.
ADOPT.WHY_ADOPT_QUESTION: Why do you want to adopt this pet?
ADOPT.WHY_ADOPT_HINT: Describe why you believe you are the right person to adopt this pet
ADOPT.SUPPORTING_DOCUMENTS_HINT: Add documents that support your application (optional)

ERRORS.PET_NOT_FOUND_MESSAGE: Please check the link or try again later.

VALIDATION.EMAIL: Please enter a valid email (e.g., user@domain.com)
VALIDATION.PATTERN_PHONE: Please enter a valid phone number (numbers only)
VALIDATION.PATTERN_ZIP: Please enter a valid postal code (e.g., 12345)
VALIDATION.PATTERN_HOURS: Please enter valid operating hours in 24-hour format (e.g., 09:00,17:00)
VALIDATION.UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
VALIDATION.LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
VALIDATION.NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
VALIDATION.SPECIAL_CHAR: Password must contain at least one special character
VALIDATION.INVALID_TIME_RANGE: Closing time must be after opening time

PERSONAL_INFO.GOOGLE_POPULATED_DESC: We've imported your information from Google. You can review and edit if needed.
PERSONAL_INFO.TITLE: Personal Information

ERRORS.FULL_NAME_MINLENGTH: Full name must be at least 5 characters long
ERRORS.PHONE_INVALID: Please enter a valid phone number
ERRORS.ZIP_INVALID: Please enter a valid ZIP code
ERRORS.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Invalid file type. Only images are allowed.

ACCOUNT_DETAILS.TITLE: Account Details
ACCOUNT_DETAILS.GOOGLE_LINKED: Your account is linked with Google.

SHELTER_INFO.TITLE: Shelter Information
SHELTER_INFO.DESCRIPTION_HINT: Please provide a short description of your shelter (at least 10 characters)
SHELTER_INFO.SOCIAL_HINT: Add your social media profiles to help people find and connect with your shelter. You can fill in any combination of platforms.
SHELTER_INFO.HOURS_HINT: Leave all days empty or fill in hours for all days

ERRORS.SHELTER_NAME_MINLENGTH: Shelter name must be at least 3 characters long
ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_MINLENGTH: Description must be at least 10 characters long
ERRORS.OPENING_TIME_FORMAT: Opening time must be in HH:MM format (e.g. 09:00)
ERRORS.CLOSING_TIME_FORMAT: Closing time must be in HH:MM format (e.g. 17:00)
ERRORS.TIME_RANGE_INVALID: Closing time must be after opening time
ERRORS.BOTH_TIMES_REQUIRED: You must fill in both times
ERRORS.HOURS_OR_CLOSED_REQUIRED: You must set operating hours or select "Closed"
ERRORS.ALL_DAYS_REQUIRED: You must set operating hours for all days or select them as "Closed"
ERRORS.DAY_HOURS_REQUIRED: You must set operating hours or select "Closed" for

SIGNUP.OTP_DESC: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone
SIGNUP.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your account exists, but your email is not verified. We've sent a verification email to
SIGNUP.PLEASE_VERIFY_EMAIL_TO_LOGIN: Please verify your email to log in.
SIGNUP.EMAIL_SENT: We've sent a verification email to
SIGNUP.PLEASE_VERIFY_EMAIL_TO_COMPLETE: Please verify your email to complete your registration.
SIGNUP.VERIFY_EMAIL_STEPS_TITLE: Follow these steps to verify your email:
SIGNUP.VERIFY_EMAIL_STEP1: Check your inbox for an email from Pawfect
SIGNUP.VERIFY_EMAIL_STEP2: Click the verification link in the email to activate your account
SIGNUP.VERIFY_EMAIL_STEP3: If you don't see the email, check your spam or junk folder
SIGNUP.OTP_ERROR_MESSAGE: The OTP code is invalid. Please try again.
SIGNUP.RESEND_OTP_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred while sending the code. Please try again.
SIGNUP.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SENT_MESSAGE: The verification email was sent successfully.
SIGNUP.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_RESEND_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred while sending the email. Please try again.

VERIFIED.NO_TOKEN: You have not verified your account.
VERIFIED.INVALID_TOKEN: The verification email is no longer valid.
VERIFIED.SHELTER_MESSAGE: Verification completed. An administrator will review your registration. Check your email for updates.
VERIFIED.USER_MESSAGE: Your email has been successfully verified.

RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST.INSTRUCTIONS: Enter your email to receive reset instructions
RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST.SUCCESS: Reset instructions have been sent to your email.
RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST.ERROR: An error occurred while sending the instructions. Please try again.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: New Password
RESET_PASSWORD.SUCCESS: Your password has been changed successfully!
RESET_PASSWORD.ERROR: An error occurred while changing the password. Please try again.

GOOGLE.ACCESS_DENIED: Access was denied. Please allow access to continue.
GOOGLE.GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred during sign-in. Please try again.
GOOGLE.INVALID_RESPONSE: Invalid response from Google. Please try again.
GOOGLE.PROCESSING_ERROR: Error processing the response. Please try again.

VALIDATORS.UPPERCASE_REQUIRED: At least one uppercase letter required
VALIDATORS.LOWERCASE_REQUIRED: At least one lowercase letter required
VALIDATORS.SPECIAL_CHAR_REQUIRED: At least one special character required

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Oops! The pet got lost...
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you're looking for has been lost on the internet. Let's go back to the home page!

SEARCH.TITLE: Find your perfect
SEARCH.SUBTITLE: Describe your ideal pet and let us find it for you
SEARCH.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: e.g. A friendly dog that loves children...

SUGGESTIONS.CHILD_FRIENDLY_QUERY: A calm and friendly pet that loves children
SUGGESTIONS.SMALL_SIZE_QUERY: A small pet suitable for apartment
SUGGESTIONS.ACTIVE_QUERY: An active pet for running and playing

ERRORS.SEARCH_ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to search for pets. Please try again.

SEARCH.WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: Describe your ideal pet in the search field above.
SEARCH.WELCOME_INSTRUCTIONS: Then swipe right to save your favorites or left to see the next one.

INSTRUCTIONS_MODAL.SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Describe your ideal pet in the search field.
INSTRUCTIONS_MODAL.SWIPE_DESCRIPTION: Swipe right to save your favorites or left to see the next one.
INSTRUCTIONS_MODAL.SAVED_PETS_DESCRIPTION: Saved pets appear at the bottom of the page. You can view them all together.
INSTRUCTIONS_MODAL.ADOPTION_DESCRIPTION: Click the "Adopt me now!" button to start the pet adoption process.
